name: Witness Intimidation
text: Give to the Peter Parker player. [acceleration] Treat each [[CLUE]] card's text box as if it were blank, except for [[TRAITS]] and keywords. Alter-Ego Action: Exhaust Peter Parker → remove Witness Intimidation from the game.

flavor: Norman Osborn's gang of carnival freaks have subjected the city to a reign of terror.
name: The Case Of The Circus Freaks
text: Forced Interrupt: When the villain phase begins, the first player chooses to take 1 damage or place 1 threat here. [amplify]

name: Norman Osborn
text: Villainous. [star] Norman Osborn gets +X hit points, where X is equal to Spider-Man Noir's case's strength. (Spider-Man Noir's nemesis minion.)

flavor: “You don't ever want to cross The Vulture.” — Ben Urich
name: Adrian Toomes
text: Guard. Villainous. [star] Adrian Toomes's attacks gain overkill. [star] Boost: Put Adrian Toomes into play engaged with you.

flavor: “There is no creature or beast that can escape the crack of my whip!”
name: Sergei Kravinoff
text: Guard. Retaliate 1. [star] Boost: Put Sergei Kravinoff into play engaged with you.

name: Freaks Unleashed
text: When Revealed: Search the encounter deck and discard pile for a [[CRIMINAL]] minion and put it into play engaged with you. Give each [[CRIMINAL]] minion engaged with you a tough status card.

flavor: The Magnificent Mysterio may leave audiences awestruck, but their sense of belief isn't the only thing left missing.
name: The Sticky-Fingered Illusionist
text: When Revealed: Each player places 1 card at random from their hand beneath this scheme. When Defeated: Return each facedown card here to its owner's hand.

flavor: “My dear boy. I'm a magician. Tricks are what I do.”
name: Quentin Beck
text: Forced Response: After Quentin Beck activates against you, discard 1 card at random from your hand.

flavor: “I must bid you adieu!” — Quentin Beck
name: Smoke Bomb
text: Attach to the minion with the most remaining hit points. If you cannot, this card gains surge. Forced Interrupt: When attached minion would be defeated, shuffle it into the encounter deck instead.

flavor: “... I shall require a volunteer.” — Quentin Beck
name: “For My Next Trick ...”
text: When Revealed: In player order, each player must choose to either discard 1 card at random from their hand or take 3 damage.
